head: abc3c3240b98d32d79f029c43b3eec2332e98315
title: Promise.{all,allSettled,race} should check resolve is a function before opening their iteratable

revs.author: Keith Miller
revs.subject: This change makes promise.{all,allSettled,race} behave more like a canonical JS implementation.  In particular, the resolve property is now checked to be callable before beginning iteration on the first argument.
